column4: under what package name would I find the development files for ncurses?
have you searched in synaptic for ncurses dev?
are you using intrepid? have you enabled the repos?
it sounds weird that wireless wouldn't use the dns cache
have you tried any other dns caching system? I think there are a couple of them
how long does a simple "host www.google.com" take?
have you tried using opendns servers?
ah.. to see if it has to reload the files?
I wish to not have it check for an update on the file time/size
I'll have a look.. see what I can find
my files are on a remote server which I am accessing via sshfs. It causes about ~5 seconds DELAY when switching to a different file.. horrible
I combed through the globals property file. Didn't find anything that had an effect on it.
I'm browsing the scite manuals.. nothing good yet
have you tried the load.on.activate setting?
yes with no effect. I believe that setting is for when you target the Scite window, not for the files themselves.
